item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 15, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Wordllama – Things you can do with the token embeddings of an LLM (146 points | 7 comments)
2. Show HN: Bullshit Remover (152 points | 58 comments)
3. OpenSCAD: The Programmer's Solid 3D CAD Modeller (310 points | 99 comments)
4. Lazarus Group laundered $200M from 25 crypto hacks to fiat (177 points | 97 comments)
5. Mastering Null Semantics: Translating SQL Expressions to OpenSearch DSL (13 points | 2 comments)
6. AT&T's Hobbit Microprocessor (2023) (12 points | 1 comment)
7. Where are programming languages created? A zoomable map (45 points | 28 comments)
8. One in five genetics papers contains errors thanks to Microsoft Excel (2016) (266 points | 154 comments)
9. We're not going to run out of new anatomy anytime soon (74 points | 28 comments)
10. Writing a Lisp compiler (Lisp to assembly) from scratch in JavaScript (2018) (45 points | 2 comments)
11. A Time Consuming Pitfall for 32-Bit Applications on AArch64 (43 points | 17 comments)
12. Terence Tao on O1 (570 points | 352 comments)
13. Google Has Officially Killed Cache Links (98 points | 38 comments)
14. Writing an OS in Rust (328 points | 39 comments)
15. European Consumer Organization goes after publishers for their in-game currency (35 points | 8 comments)
16. CSCI 181G PO: Game Engine Programming (65 points | 7 comments)
17. The Bastard Operator from Hell (1999) (189 points | 61 comments)
18. After 155 years, the Campbell Soup company is changing its name (3 points | 1 comment)
19. Powerful, Open-Source, Programmatic CAD (28 points | 5 comments)
20. Ask HN: Must-Read Books for Startups? (54 points | 25 comments)
21. Making a rickroll laser: A parametric speaker (168 points | 47 comments)
22. How to optimize boot time in user space on a Raspberry Pi 4 / Boot2Qt (11 points | 6 comments)
23. Show HN: I made a digital circuit drawing and simulation game (49 points | 2 comments)
24. Optimizing your career for happiness (40 points | 20 comments)
25. Warewoolf: A minimalist novel-writing system/rich text editor (55 points | 24 comments)
26. Founder Mode, hackers, and being bored by tech (242 points | 117 comments)
27. Show HN: Epitomē – A semantic search engine for ancient text (7 points | 4 comments)
28. Nesting Allocators (2023) (81 points | 6 comments)
29. Falsehoods programmers believe about TCP (237 points | 173 comments)
30. USPS' long-awaited new mail truck makes its debut (149 points | 122 comments)
